# Register Space

## Device Overview

**[MMU](mmu.md):**

- 1 Device
- 18 Registers @ 16 Bit

**[IRQ](irq.md):**

- 1 Device
- 6 Registers @ 16 Bit

**[UART 16C550-Style](uart.md):**

- 4 Devices
- 8 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[PS/2](ps2.md):**

- 2 Devices
- 2 Registers @ 16 Bit

**[IDE / PATA](ide.md):**

- 1 Device
- 8 Registers @ 16 Bit

**[Timer](timer.md):**

- 2 Devices
- 4 Registers @ 16 Bit

**[RTC](rtc.md):**

- 1 Device
- 3 Registers @ 16 Bit
- 8 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[Joystick](joystick.md):**

- 2 Devices
- 1 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[Parallel Port](parport.md):**

- 1 Device
- 3 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[PCM Audio Control/Status](pcm.md):**

- 1 Device

**[DMA Control/Status](dma.md):**

- 1 Device

**[VGA Card](vga.md):**

- 1 Device
- 3 Registers @ 16 Bit
- 2 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[Ethernet](eth.md):**

- 1 Device
- 3 Registers @ 16 Bit
- 7 Registers @ 8 Bit

**[VGA Palette Memory](vga.md):**

- 1 Device
- 256 Registers @ 16 Bit

## Device Mapping

| Address    | Offset | Count | Peripherial                        |
| ---------- | ------ | ----- | ---------------------------------- |
| `0x7FE000` | 0      | 36    | [MMU](mmu.md)                      |
| `0x7FE030` | 48     | 12    | [IRQ](irq.md)                      |
| `0x7FE040` | 64     | 8     | [UART 16C550-Style (1)](uart.md)   |
| `0x7FE050` | 80     | 8     | [UART 16C550-Style (2)](uart.md)   |
| `0x7FE060` | 96     | 8     | [UART 16C550-Style (3)](uart.md)   |
| `0x7FE070` | 112    | 8     | [UART 16C550-Style (4)](uart.md)   |
| `0x7FE080` | 128    | 4     | [PS/2 (1)](ps2.md)                 |
| `0x7FE090` | 144    | 4     | [PS/2 (2)](ps2.md)                 |
| `0x7FE0A0` | 160    | 16    | [IDE / PATA](ide.md)               |
| `0x7FE0B0` | 176    | 8     | [Timer (1)](timer.md)              |
| `0x7FE0C0` | 192    | 8     | [Timer (2)](timer.md)              |
| `0x7FE0D0` | 208    | 14    | [RTC](rtc.md)                      |
| `0x7FE0E0` | 224    | 1     | [Joystick (1)](joystick.md)        |
| `0x7FE0F0` | 240    | 1     | [Joystick (2)](joystick.md)        |
| `0x7FE100` | 256    | 3     | [Parallel Port](parport.md)        |
| `0x7FE110` | 272    | 0     | [PCM Audio Control/Status](pcm.md) |
| `0x7FE110` | 272    | 0     | [DMA Control/Status](dma.md)       |
| `0x7FE110` | 272    | 8     | [VGA Card](vga.md)                 |
| `0x7FE120` | 288    | 13    | [Ethernet](eth.md)                 |
| `0x7FE200` | 512    | 512   | [VGA Palette Memory](vga.md)       |
| `0x7FE400` | 1024   |       | _end of peripherials_              |
